g.text: Use case : show flight availability on calendar
Use case : User select flight and fare

svg.desc:
@startuml autonumber
title OTA Message Flow
actor "End Customer" as customer box "3rd party" #ffdddd participant "Airline\nApplication" as clientApp end box box "Worldticket" #lightblue participant "OTA" as ota participant SMS5 as sms end box
== Use Case : landing page == note over clientApp Show the route options. Departure &amp; Arrival airport end note customer -> clientApp : open web/app activate clientApp clientApp -> sms : GET /routes activate sms clientApp <-- sms : airport list deactivate sms customer <-- clientApp : show \norigin/destination list deactivate clientApp deactivate customer
... == Use case : show flight availability on calendar == customer -> clientApp : select\norigin/destination activate clientApp note right clientApp (origin, destination , number of pax , pax type) end note clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirAvailRQ activate ota clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirAvailRS deactivate ota note right clientApp flight availability on each RBD end note customer <-- clientApp : show calendar \nwith availability deactivate clientApp
... == Use case : Flight search == customer -> clientApp note right customer (origin, destination , number of pax , pax type) end note activate clientApp clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirLowFareSearchRQ activate ota clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirLowFareSearchRS deactivate ota customer <-- clientApp : flight list with lowest price deactivate clientApp
... == Use case : User select flight and fare == customer -> clientApp : select fare activate clientApp clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirPriceRQ activate ota clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirPriceRS deactivate ota note right clientApp Price break dow &amp; Fare rules end note customer <-- clientApp : show fare break down\n and price detail deactivate clientApp
... == Use case : Make reservation == customer -> clientApp : Booking information activate clientApp note right clientApp Pax name, addr, phone no., CTC, etc. end note clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirBookRQ activate ota clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirBookRS deactivate ota note right clientApp Success : Booking information PNR Record Locator end note customer <-- clientApp : show booking detail deactivate clientApp
alt modify booking customer -> clientApp : RepriceRequired="true" note right customer Modification can be - change name - SSR - rebook - etc end note note right clientApp RepriceRequired="true" **get price** not modify end note activate clientApp clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirBookModifyRQ activate ota clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirBookModifyRS deactivate ota note right clientApp Service **fee/charge** for booking modification end note customer <-- clientApp : show **fee/charge**\nfor booking modify deactivate clientApp customer -> clientApp : **default** or RepriceRequired="false" activate clientApp clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirBookModifyRQ activate ota note right ota : modify booking clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirBookModifyRS deactivate ota customer <-- clientApp : show booking modify deactivate clientApp end
... == Use case : issue e ticket == customer -> clientApp : Pay activate clientApp clientApp -> clientApp : Process payment activate clientApp deactivate clientApp clientApp -> ota : OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ activate ota clientApp <-- ota : OTA_AirDemandTicketRS deactivate ota note right clientApp Success : ticket information end note customer <-- clientApp : booking confirmed deactivate clientApp @enduml
